counter.aggregators
Class ServiceSupervisor

java.lang.Object
  counter.aggregators.ServiceSupervisor
All Implemented Interfaces:
dks.niche.fractal.interfaces.EventHandlerInterface, dks.niche.fractal.interfaces.InitInterface, dks.niche.fractal.interfaces.MovableInterface, org.objectweb.fractal.api.control.BindingController, org.objectweb.fractal.api.control.LifeCycleController
public class ServiceSupervisor
extends java.lang.Object
implements dks.niche.fractal.interfaces.EventHandlerInterface, dks.niche.fractal.interfaces.InitInterface, dks.niche.fractal.interfaces.MovableInterface, org.objectweb.fractal.api.control.BindingController, org.objectweb.fractal.api.control.LifeCycleController

The ServiceSupervisor (aggregator) aggregates all the events about counter increases sent to it by CounterChangedWatchers and ensures that the ServiceComponents are synchronized to the correct value. If one or more ServiceComponents are out of sync then it triggers a ComponentOutOfSyncEvent targeting the ConfigurationManager that will ensure this message to be delivered to the ServiceComponents eventually so that they resynchronize to the correct state.

It can be set to two different check strictness levels: -Strict : IS_CALCULATION_STRICT = true : ensures the syncronization of values. -Not Strict : IS_CALCULATION_STRICT = false : uses a more loose checking algorithm
